page.title: 07RECREATION
page.content: At the moment the popular game for boys in the playground is Bulldog. One boy stands in the middle of the playground and the other people stand in a circle at the other end of the playground. When the boy in the middle says British Bulldog we all run to the other side trying not to be caught. The girls play skipping and sing rhymes. Examples are, 'On a mountain stands a lady Who she is I do not know, All she wants is gold and silver All she wants is a nice young man. So bring in my darling dear While I go out to play.' and 'Sallys in the kitchen Doing in a bit of stitching, In came a boggy man and kicked her out!'
